ROOT.GetJxpList1: select a.project_name,d.outage_dev_id,a.plan_id_y,b.start_date,b.end_date,b.plan_no,b.status,b.start_date,b.end_date from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_line_peihetingdian a left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_evn_outageplan_b_year b on a.plan_id_y=b.plan_id_y left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_evn_outageplan_r_year_dev d on a.plan_id_y=d.plan_id_y where a.line_id='{0}' ORDER BY b.start_date
ROOT.GetJxpList: select p.name,d.outage_dev_id,a.plan_id_y,b.start_date,b.end_date,b.plan_no,b.status,b.start_date,b.end_date from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_project_outageplan_year a JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_project_line l ON a.project_id=l.project_id JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_project_info p ON a.project_id=p.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_evn_outageplan_b_year b on a.plan_id_y=b.plan_id_y left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_evn_outageplan_r_year_dev d on a.plan_id_y=d.plan_id_y where l.line_id='{0}' ORDER BY b.start_date
ROOT.GetProjectList: select id,name,state,voltage,start_time,operate_time,brief from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_project_info ORDER BY start_time DESC
ROOT.GetProjectJxpList: select d.outage_dev_id,a.plan_id_y,b.start_date,b.end_date,b.plan_no,b.status,b.start_date,b.end_date from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_project_outageplan_year a left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_evn_outageplan_b_year b on a.plan_id_y=b.plan_id_y left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_evn_outageplan_r_year_dev d on a.plan_id_y=d.plan_id_y where a.project_id='{0}' ORDER BY b.start_date
ROOT.GetProjectJxpListEx: select p.name,d.outage_dev_id,a.plan_id_y,b.start_date,b.end_date,b.plan_no,b.status,b.start_date,b.end_date from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_project_outageplan_year a JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_project_info p ON a.project_id=p.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_evn_outageplan_b_year b on a.plan_id_y=b.plan_id_y left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_evn_outageplan_r_year_dev d on a.plan_id_y=d.plan_id_y where a.project_id='{0}' ORDER BY b.start_date
ROOT.GetProjectCross: select crosslineid,crosslinename,longitude,latitude from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_con_linecross_info c JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_project_line l ON c.lineid=l.line_id where project_id='{0}'
